mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_CREATED_DATE, BOARD_VIEW_COUNT, BOARD_LIKE_COUNT, BOARD_YEAR, USER_ID FROM GGHJ_BOARD WHERE rownum BETWEEN 1 AND 4 ORDER BY BOARD_VIEW_COUNT DESC

SELECT BOARD_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_PUBLIC, BOARD_CREATED_DATE, BOARD_UPDATED_DATE, BOARD_VIEW_COUNT, BOARD_LIFE_CYCLE, BOARD_LIKE_COUNT, BOARD_YEAR, USER_ID FROM GGHJ_BOARD WHERE BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%a%' OR BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%a%' ORDER BY BOARD_CREATED_DATE DESC
